oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Confederate veteran John Hansford Stephens and his family
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Postwar photograph of Pvt. John Hantsford (or Hauntsford) Stephens and his family. He was a Private in Co. F, 8th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, a unit organized at Livingston of upper Cumberland Plateau men. Pictured are John Hansford Stephens (seated), his wife Mrs. Ella Stephens (seated), Miss Mary Smith who was the sister of Mrs. Stephens (standing), son Ray Stephens (standing) and son Guy Stephens (seated on the floor.) Mr. Stephens was one of 6 involved in the creation of Montvale Academy.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hantsford Stephens, John; Stephens, Ella ; Smith, Mary; Stephens, Ray; Stephens, Guy
